# {{lb|zh|Chinese mythology}} {{w|Yinglong}}, a [[wing]]ed [[dragon]] which is said to have assisted {{w|Yu the Great}} to control the prehistoric flood, using its tail to shape rivers to guide floodwater to the ocean.
